1386300.name: Animal Trainer
1386300.description:
Become an animal trainer
If you dream to work with animals, train and care for them, start with "Animal Trainer".
It is a game that faithfully reproduces everything that happens in real work with various animals, domestic and exotic. You will learn how to work to get perfect results. The animals in our game require care, not just training. You will have to take care of their condition and well-being.

Guard dog

You can train your dog to be a guardian. It requires a lot of work, but in the end the effect will surprise you. After hard work, you will gain a courageous and effective partner who will help you in many dangerous situations.

Companion dog

A well-mannered dog is a real treasure. With gentle breed dogs such as Labrador Retrievers, you can train for obedience. You will teach him how to walk on a leash and many other commands. But here too you can make mistakes, when you shout too much, the dog will get scared and run away

Training center

In addition to working with a variety of animals, you will also build your training center. Build new buildings, horse paddocks, obstacle courses and more. Over time, you will develop it into a beautiful professional place full of animals.

Train the horses

Working with horses is both training and taking care of their condition. The horse has to run at different speeds each day. You also need to nourish and drink him. After a while, you will understand each other without words, and the horse will respond to your gestures.
1386300.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 简体中文, 韩语, 波兰语, 俄语, 土耳其语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
